enrollmentStrategy:
üéØ STRATEGY TO INCREASE DIPLOMA ENROLLMENTS

1Ô∏è‚É£  CONVERT APPLIED ‚Üí ENROLLED (Quick Win - 15 candidates)
   Current Status: 15 in "Applied" stage, need final push to enrollment
   Actions:
   ‚Ä¢ Personalized enrollment support calls (specific course questions)
   ‚Ä¢ Financing options: showcase payment plans (KES 50,000 flexibility)
   ‚Ä¢ Student success stories: video testimonials from recent graduates
   ‚Ä¢ Limited-time enrollment bonus (scholarship discount, free materials)
   Target: Convert 80% (12+ of 15) in next 14 days = +12 students = KES 600,000 revenue

2Ô∏è‚É£  OPTIMIZE PERFORMING CHANNELS
   Best Performing: Google Search Ads (6.33% conversion) + Direct/Organic (7.84%)
   Actions:
   ‚Ä¢ Increase budget allocation: Google Search +30%, Direct/Organic SEO +20%
   ‚Ä¢ Search keywords: "diploma programs Kenya", "affordable online certification"
   ‚Ä¢ Remarketing: Show enrollment forms to window-shoppers
   ‚Ä¢ SEO: Blog content for long-tail keywords (time investment, ~4-6 weeks)
   Expected ROI: 200-300% within 30 days

3Ô∏è‚É£  IMPROVE PAID CHANNEL QUALITY (Scale Volume)
   Challenge: Performance Max high volume (775 leads) but lower conversion (3.23%)
   Actions:
   ‚Ä¢ Tighten audience targeting: exclude "just browsing" segments
   ‚Ä¢ Creative testing: Focus on financing/affordability messaging
   ‚Ä¢ Landing page optimization: Clear enrollment CTA, reduce form fields (2-3 max)
   ‚Ä¢ Implement lead scoring: Pre-qualify before enrollment team engagement
   Expected Improvement: 3.23% ‚Üí 4.5% conversion = +31 additional enrollments

4Ô∏è‚É£  STRATEGIC FOCUS FOR NEXT INTAKE
   Feb-Mar 2026 (Final push for January 2026 cohort):
   ‚Ä¢ Apply all conversion tactics above
   ‚Ä¢ Email nurture: Weekly value content to 23 in "Decision Making" stage
   ‚Ä¢ Phone follow-up: Intensive outreach to Decision Making candidates
   ‚Ä¢ Financing: Partner with lenders for >60% of students needing installments

   Apr 2026 (April 2026 intake launch):
   ‚Ä¢ Launch PPC campaigns 8 weeks before intake (early March)
   ‚Ä¢ Build organic content SEO foundation (Jan-Feb foundation work)
   ‚Ä¢ Scale best-performing channels: Search Ads 2x budget, Performance Max 1.5x
   ‚Ä¢ Expected registrations: 150-200 new leads ‚Üí 30-40 enrollments

5Ô∏è‚É£  CONVERSION RATE TARGETS
   Current: 0.0% lead ‚Üí enrolled
   30-Day Target: 4.5% (102 enrollments, +14 from current)
   90-Day Target: 5.5% (126 enrollments, +38 from current)
   Annual Target (3 intakes): 600+ enrollments = KES 30M+ revenue
